name: Clinn
description:
Your parents decided to go on a vacation and left you taking care of the family’s inn for 3 days. 

You must keep the inn clean, so guests don’t quit the inn. To do so, you can hire cleaners, or clean yourself by using cleaning products. To progress to the next day, you must accomplish the minimum required number of points.

Credits
  • Level Art by LiMezu
  • Music by Kevin MacLeod
  • Music by Bensound
